mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM team_ex WHERE team_name = #{name}) as exist;
INSERT INTO team_image(team_id, team_image_url) VALUES (((SELECT MAX(team_id) FROM team_ex) + 1), #{URL});

INSERT INTO team_ex(category_id, team_name, team_area, uniform, team_leader_id, team_vehicle, membership_fee, membership_per, representative_image_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{name}, #{area}, #{uniform}, #{leader}, #{vehicle}, #{fee}, #{period}, (SELECT image_id FROM team_image WHERE team_image_url = #{URL}) );
SELECT IFNULL((SELECT IF(ti.image_id = te.representative_image_id, 1, 0) FROM team_ex AS te LEFT JOIN team_image AS ti ON ti.team_id = te.team_id WHERE ti.team_image_url = #{URL}), 0) AS isMatched;
